title: Roland Sands
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
itunes:title: Roland Sands
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary:
Roland Sands is an American motorcycle racer and designer of custom high-performance motorcycles. He has raced and customized everything on two wheels, from track-oriented liter bikes to Indian baggers to electric scooters. All his creations are not just stunning to look at but perform as well. We get into how he got his start, the crazy events he puts on, and why someone would want to take a bagger to Laguna Seca.

https://rolandsands.com/
